iA Writer Now Shares to Wordpress

One of my favorite apps for iOS (and Android) is iA Writer, and Version 3.1.4 brings what I think is a pretty good upgrade - support to posts drafts to your wordpress site.

iA Writer on the App Store

Share to WordPress - Add your account in Settings - Create drafts on your WordPress site with File > Share > New Draft on WordPress
